title: My Pixel 4a front camera has yellow tint. Video calls are absolutely crap. Please help resolve this,
content: My Pixel 4a front camera has yellow tint. Video calls are absolutely crap. Please help me resolve this, or let me know the process to return. I waited for so long to buy this phone as it just wasnt available form the only official seller, and when I finally managed to grab one, it turned out to be really sub-par. What a waste of money!
